无法还原安装包
提示：新版UEngine安装后会自动删除安装包，备份的Apk在/tmp/uengine-runner/bak.apk，电脑重启后就会丢失！

Error.SaveApkIconError: 本程序不支持保存该 apk 的图标
Error.SettingReadError: 读取设置错误！无法打开设置窗口！
Error.ConnectServerStarError: 无法连接服务器！无法进行评分！
Error.ApkFileError: 该应用安装包异常，无法查询相关数据！

Answer.Title: 提示
AllowOrDisallowUpdateAndroidAppAnswer: 你确定要启用 UEngine 可以安装以及使用默认的更新程序升级应用？（即允许未知来源）
你确定要禁用 UEngine 可以安装以及使用默认的更新程序升级应用？（即禁止未知来源）
Answer.UseAdbPackageAnswer: 你没有安装 adb 补丁，必须安装才能继续。是否安装？

Error.InstallError: You don't input the APK file path, Can't install Android program by now.
Error.UninstallError: You don't input the APK file path or android program package name, Can't uninstall Android program by now.
Error.BackApkError:
Can't recover the apk
Tips: Newer UEngine will delete the APK installing file when finish install, recover apk is in "tmp/uengine-runner/bak.apk", but it will be lose when you restart your computer.
Error.ChooseApkError: You don't choose any APK file.
Error.SaveApkIconError: This APK file isn't allow to save the icon file.
Error.PathError: Path not found, please try again
Error.SettingReadError: Read user setting error! Can't to continue to set!
Error.ConnectServerStarError: Can't connect the cloud server! So can't give star for the app!
Error.ApkFileError: This apk file is error and can't find any data about the apk file!

Answer.Title: Tips
AllowOrDisallowUpdateAndroidAppAnswer: Are you sure to allow UEngine to install or update other android program? (Allow )（即允许未知来源）
Are you sure to disallow UEngine to install or update other android program? (Allow )（即允许未知来源）
Answer.UseAdbPackageAnswer:
You don't install adb package with UEngine, you must install, and after install you can connect to set.
Do you want to install?
